message: Dear Bob, I am excited to present our premium product, which I believe is an excellent fit for your needs. Given its value and quality, I understand it's worth $12,000 to you. To make this opportunity accessible while ensuring fair compensation, I propose a special introductory offer of $10,800. This represents a significant saving for you, while also allowing us to maintain a competitive edge in the market. I look forward to your consideration and hope we can reach a mutually beneficial agreement.
